original_text: Some seeds fell among thorn bushes. This is like some other people who hear the message from God. But they start to have many troubles in their minds about how they will live. They want to get more money and more things. They think that this will make them happy. So they do not let God's message change them. They are like plants that do not grow into strong plants.
korean_text: 가시떨기에 떨어졌다는 것은 말씀을 들은 자이나 지내는 중 이생의 염려와 재물과 향락에 기운이 막혀 온전히 결실하지 못하는 자요

sentences.original_text: Some seeds fell among thorn bushes.
This is like some other people
who hear the message from God.
But they start to have many troubles
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 많은 문제들을 갖게 됩니다

sentences.original_text: in their minds about how they will live.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 어떻게 살아갈지에 대해 마음속으로 걱정합니다.

sentences.original_text: They want to get more money
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 더 많은 돈을 얻고 싶어합니다

sentences.original_text: They think that this will make them happy.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 이것이 그들을 행복하게 만들 것이라고 생각합니다.

sentences.original_text: So they do not let God's message change them.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 하나님의 메시지가 자신들을 바꾸게 두지 않습니다.

sentences.original_text: that do not grow into strong plants.
sentences.korean_translation: 강한 식물로 자라지 않는 식물들과 같습니다.
